title: Similar Script Face
content:
Can anyone suggest a script face that is (very) similar to this?  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/gideon/alex-brush/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120717055958/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/gideon/alex-brush/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/gideon/alex-brush/")

Thanks.
author: Hildebrant

comments.content:
Is that face off-limits?

I'm using Bickley script for a project and thought it was similar — not (very) similar though.

Blue,

We have looked at that as an option. It's not off limits, its just not quite right--however it's close.

Ignacio,

Thank you. Holyday is one that I had missed. There is potential there.

Hi Hildebrant,

And as an added bonus, House Industries has their Holiday Scripts font set on sale until September 15th:

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=specials](http://web.archive.org/web/20120717055958/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=specials "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=specials")

Cheers,  
John the Fontaholic
